PLC.des: All series of PLCs from the 'HC' family are designed to deliver exceptional performance and advanced features that drive industrial automation to new levels of efficiency and precision, in addition to IoT technology, enabling remote programming.

HCS.d4: Output type: Relay and NPN and PNP transistor
HCS.d5: Supports up to 3 local I/O and special function expansion modules.
HCS.d6: Supports unlimited remote I/O and special function expansion modules.
HCS.d7: Compatible with HNC Cloud and IoT Bus App for iOS and Android.

HCG.d4: Output type: Relay and NPN and PNP transistor (Max 4 at 200 kHz).
HCG.d5: Supports up to 15 local I/O and special function expansion modules.
HCG.d6: Supports unlimited remote I/O and special function expansion modules.
HCG.d7: Compatible with HNC Cloud and IoT Bus App for iOS and Android.

HCM.d4: Output type: Relay and NPN and PNP transistor (Max 8 at 200 kHz).
HCM.d5: Supports up to 15 local I/O and special function expansion modules.
HCM.d6: Supports linear and circular interpolation for up to 2 axes.
HCM.d7: Compatible with HNC Cloud and IoT Bus App for iOS and Android.

HMCS.des: The HMC-S is a state-of-the-art product dedicated to controlling position control applications of up to 16 axes with high precision and high processing speed via EtherCAT with a modular PLC of up to 16 digital, analog, and temperature I/O modules. It features simplified, unified, and universal programming with other brands in the industry thanks to its compatibility with CODESYS.
HMCS.d3: Maximum supported axes: Up to 16 axes
HMCS.d5: Communication protocol: Modbus TCP/IP (LAN Port 1/2), EtherCAT (ECAT Port), Modbus RTU RS485 / CANopen (DB9 Port)
HMCS.d6: Digital inputs and outputs: Up to 16 NPN/PNP Inputs, Up to 16 NPN/PNP Outputs depending on the model
HMCS.d7: Compatible with local expansion modules: Up to 16 Digital I/O, Analog I/O, Temperature modules

HMCG.des: The HMC-G from AUCTECH, like the HMC-S, is a state-of-the-art product capable of controlling the position of up to 128 axes simultaneously with high precision and speed via EtherCAT with a PLC of up to 32 I/Os while also being an industrial PC with Core i7 processing.
HMCG.d3: Maximum supported axes: Up to 128 axes
HMCG.d5: Communication protocol: Modbus TCP/IP (LAN Port 2/3/4), EtherCAT (LAN Port 1), Ethernet I/P (LAN Port 2/3/4)
HMCG.d6: Digital inputs and outputs: 16 NPN/PNP Inputs, 16 NPN/PNP Outputs depending on the model
HMCG.d7: Industrial PC operating system: Windows 7 / Windows 11
HMCG.d8: Industrial PC processor: Intel Celeron / Core i3 / Core i7

HMI.des: The HT3000 HMI family stands out for its fully adjustable design, bright colors, and clearer resolution. It also offers advanced capabilities such as remote programming, firmware download, and updates. It incorporates integrated cloud access and alarm notifications, enabling efficient management and optimized connectivity through the HNC cloud platform, MQTT, or its IoTBus Cloud app.

HT3000.d2: Screen resolution: 800 x 400 pixels, 1024 x 600 pixels, 1920 x 1080 pixels
HT3000.d5: Compatible with HNC Cloud and IoT Bus App for iOS and Android

HBOX.d3: Compatible with HNC Cloud and IoT Bus App for iOS and Android

HBOXMPRO.d4: Compatible with HNC Cloud and IoT Bus App for iOS and Android

HCCA8.d4: Up to 8 points for digital inputs
HCCA8.d5: Supports up to 15 local I/O and special function expansion modules
HCCA8.d6: Compatible with HNC Cloud and IoT Bus App for iOS and Android

HRS.d4: Operation mode: Multi-start Programmable delayed start function
HRS.d5: Variety of protection functions against: Overvoltage, Overheating, Phase loss, Motor overload, etc.

HV10.d1: Integrated communication protocol: Modbus RTU RS485
HV10.d2: Control modes: Integrated communication protocol: Modbus RTU RS485, V/F, Advanced V/F, Separable V/F, Open-loop Vector (SVC)
HV10.d3: Built-in braking unit: Up to 18.5 kW at 220V, Up to 22 kW at 440V
HV10.d4: Macro implementation for applications such as: Constant Pressure Multi-pump Water Supply, Solar Pumping with MPPT, Spindle Motor Control in CNC Machine Tools, Pump/Motor Control in Fire Control Systems (Fire Patrol), VFD Control as Emergency Power Supply (EPS), User-defined (customized)
HV10.d5: High-performance hardware: Removable keypad with standardized port, Keypad with dual display
HV10.d6: Compatible with LCD keypad with parameter copy function.

HV100.des: The HV100 series combines the features of a conventional variable speed drive with high-performance functions that distinguish it as a unique and special product. This series is designed for less common applications, including those requiring DC power supply, making it a hybrid drive.
HV100.d1: Integrated communication protocol: Modbus RTU RS485
HV100.d2: Control modes: V/F, Advanced V/F, Separable V/F, Open-loop Vector (SVC)
HV100.d3: Built-in braking unit: Up to 18.5 kW at 220V, Up to 22 kW at 440V
HV100.d4: Macro implementation for applications such as: Constant Pressure Multi-pump Water Supply, Solar Pumping with MPPT, Spindle Motor Control in CNC Machine Tools, Pump/Motor Control in Fire Control Systems (Fire Patrol), VFD Control as Emergency Power Supply (EPS), User-defined (customized)
HV100.d5: High-performance hardware: Removable keypad with standardized port, Keypad with dual display
HV100.d6: Compatible with LCD keypad with parameter copy function.

HV100W.d1: Integrated communication protocol: Modbus RTU RS485
HV100W.d2: Control modes: V/F, Advanced V/F, Separable V/F, Open-loop Vector (SVC)
HV100W.d3: Macro implementation for applications such as: Constant Pressure Multi-pump Water Supply, Solar Pumping with MPPT, Spindle Motor Control in CNC Machine Tools, Pump/Motor Control in Fire Control Systems (Fire Patrol), VFD Control as Emergency Power Supply (EPS), User-defined (customized)

HV480.d1: Integrated communication protocol: Modbus RTU RS485
HV480.d2: Compatible with cards for different communication protocols: EtherNET/IP, EtherNET/TCP IP, DeviceNET, PROFINET, PROFIBUS, CANopen
HV480.d3: Compatible with LCD keypad with parameter copy function.
HV480.d4: Compatible with parameter configuration software and oscilloscope.

HV610.d1: Integrated communication protocol: Modbus RTU RS485
HV610.d2: Compatible with cards for different communication protocols: EtherNET/IP, EtherNET/TCP IP, DeviceNET, PROFINET, PROFIBUS, CANopen
HV610.d3: Compatible with encoder cards: Differential, Open collector, Resolver
HV610.d4: Control modes: Built-in braking unit: V/F, Open-loop Vector (SVC), Closed-loop Vector (FVC)
HV610.d5: Compatible with parameter configuration software and oscilloscope.
HV610.d6: Compatible with LCD keypad with parameter copy function

HV320.d1: Integrated communication protocol: Modbus RTU RS485
HV320.d2: Compatible with cards for different communication protocols: EtherNET/IP, EtherNET/TCP IP, DeviceNET, PROFINET, PROFIBUS, CANopen, EtherCAT
HV320.d3: Compatible with encoder cards: Differential, Open collector, Resolver
HV320.d4: Compatible with I/O extension cards, Digital I/O, Analog I/O, Relay output
HV320.d5: Control modes: V/F, Open-loop Vector (SVC), Closed-loop Vector (FVC)
HV320.d6: Built-in braking unit: Up to 15 kW at 220V, Up to 30 kW at 440V
HV320.d7: Compatible with LCD keypad with parameter copy function.
HV320.d9: Compatible with parameter configuration software and oscilloscope.

HBU.d1: Power supply: Three-phase AC 380~440V, Three-phase AC 220 V

SVE3.des: The SV-E3 series stands out for its simplified and functional design, compact size, high performance, and simple and highly reliable operation.
SVE3.d3: Control mode: Standard Model, Classic Model, Position/Speed/Torque, Position

SVX3EA.des: This series offers the ideal solution for various industrial sectors requiring automation in high-speed and precision applications. Its high-performance functions enable more efficient and optimized processes.
SVX3EA.d4: Control mode: Position/Speed/Torque/Position x Speed/Position x Torque/Speed x Torque
SVX3EA.d10: Compatible with configuration and monitoring software

HSD6.des: The HSD6 series has been designed and manufactured using an advanced control algorithm, based on market demands. It incorporates the functions of a standard basic series, similar to the SV-E3 series, but with higher power capacity while maintaining the same voltage supply.
HSD6.d4: Control mode: Position/Speed/Torque/Position x Speed/Position x Torque/Speed x Torque
HSD6.d13: Compatible with configuration and monitoring software

HSD7.des: The HSD7 series is the most complete and high-performance available from HNC Electric. It is compatible with multiple communication protocols and is the only one that incorporates a dedicated communication protocol (EtherCAT), simplifying and optimizing motion and position control with high performance. Additionally, it is the only one capable of controlling two servomotors with a single drive, making it ideal for applications such as CNC routers, laser cutting machines, among others.
HSD7.d4: Control mode: Position/Speed/Torque/Position x Speed/Position x Torque/Speed x Torque/Internal Multi-speed/Internal Multi-speed x Speed/Internal Multi-speed x Position/Internal Multi-speed x Torque
HSD7.d5: Communication protocol: Modbus RTU RS485, CanOpen, MECHATROLINK-II, MECHATROLINK-III, EtherCAT
HSD7.d6: Compatible with configuration and monitoring software
HSD7.d13: Compatible with configuration and monitoring software

HSV180AD.des: The HSV-180AD series is ideal for applications where a servodrive must be integrated, specifically in a CNC machine, with an HNC controller due to its compatibility with the NCUC fieldbus (HSV-180 AD).
HSV180AD.d4: Control mode: Position / Speed / Torque / Internal Multi-speed
HSV180AD.d9: Encoder Type: TTL Incremental, Sine/Cosine Incremental, Absolute ENDAT2.1/2.2

AD3.des: The AD3 servodrive is a high-performance device focused on position, speed, and torque control via EtherCAT in a smooth and simplified manner, adapting to the most demanding needs in today's industrial field.
AD3.d3: Control mode: Position via EtherCAT / Speed / Torque
AD3.d7: Encoder Type: 23-bit Absolute / 17-bit Optical Absolute / 17-bit Magnetic Absolute

AD2.des: The AD2 servodrive is very similar to the AD3 in terms of functions and features. With much higher power, it is ideal for very large applications.
AD2.d4: Control mode: Position via EtherCAT / Speed / Torque
AD2.d8: Encoder Type: 23-bit Absolute / 17-bit Optical Absolute / 17-bit Magnetic Absolute

Robots.des: HNC Electric industrial robots are designed to provide precision and speed for today's demanding manufacturing applications. HNC also offers a complete range of industrial equipment to help manufacturers improve their production lines.

HSRJH.des: Our equipment is designed to adapt to multiple welding and grinding situations. They integrate advanced functions such as quick deployment of the welding process, welding after power interruption, intelligent weaving pattern welding, linkage with positioners, and collision prevention. With IP67 protection, they are ideal for loading and unloading operations in various working conditions. Their high speed and precision improve quality and efficiency in industrial processes.
HSRJH.d3: Maximum operating radius: 1441 mm to 2000 mm
HSRJH.d7: Admissible Moment of Inertia: 0.035 to 2.8 kgm²
HSRJH.d9: Rated power/voltage/current: 2 kW / single-phase AC220 V 50 Hz/ 10.8 A 5 kW / three-phase AC380 V/ 9.3 A
HSRJH.d10: Body/electrical cabinet protection level: IP50 or IP54 (robot arm IP67) / IP50
HSRJH.d11: Installation method: Floor / Inverted (ceiling) / Side mounting

HSRBR.des: These devices have been significantly improved to support medium to heavy loads, work at a faster pace, and have a higher protection rating. The entire design complies with the IP67 classification, making it especially suitable for a variety of applications such as painting, dusting, loading and unloading in machine tools, assembly, palletizing, and mold injection. These improvements make it ideal for demanding industrial environments, offering greater efficiency and reliability.
HSRBR.d3: Maximum operating radius: 1100 mm to 1850 mm
HSRBR.d7: Admissible Moment of Inertia: 0.15 to 3.7 kgm²
HSRBR.d9: Rated power/voltage/current: 2.1 kW / single-phase AC220 V/ 9.4 A 4.3 kW / three-phase AC380 V/ 8.1 A
HSRBR.d10: Body/electrical cabinet protection level: IP54 (robot arm IP67) / IP53
HSRBR.d11: Installation method: Floor / Inverted (ceiling) / Side mounting

HSRJR.des: These multipurpose robots are designed to meet high standards of precision, lightness, and high speed. Their compact and lightweight design, along with a flexible installation method, allows for efficient integration into various environments. Equipped with independently developed core components, these robots offer excellent performance at a reduced cost. They are widely used in applications such as glue coating, handling, sorting, and assembly, standing out for their versatility and efficiency in multiple industrial processes.
HSRJR.d3: Maximum operating radius: 570 mm to 3000 mm
HSRJR.d7: Admissible Moment of Inertia: 0.1 to 199 kgm²
HSRJR.d9: Rated power/voltage/current: 0.6 kW-1.25 kW / single-phase AC220 V 50 Hz/ 6.5 A 3 kW-17.5 kW three-phase AC380 V
HSRJR.d10: Body/electrical cabinet protection level: IP54 (robot arm IP67) / IP53
HSRJR.d11: Installation method: Floor / Inverted (ceiling) / Side mounting

HSRSR.des: This series of robots is designed for applications requiring high speed, precision, and performance. Specialized in pick-and-place tasks on work surfaces, they are widely used in the electronics, medical, and food industries. They stand out for their wide range of motion, high precision, and superior performance. These robots offer fast speed, high rigidity, small coverage area, wide working range, high adaptability, and easy and stable operation, making them ideal for a variety of industrial fields.
HSRSR.d3: Maximum operating radius: 400 mm to 1000 mm
HSRSR.d7: Admissible Moment of Inertia: 0.05/0.005 kgm² to 0.32/0.02 kgm²
HSRSR.d9: Rated power/voltage/current: 0.55 kW-1.5 kW / single-phase AC220 V 50 Hz/ 3 A
HSRSR.d10: Body/electrical cabinet protection level: IP54 / IP20

HSRCR.des: HSR-CR collaborative robots stand out for their advanced features, including collision detection, high protection level, high expansion capability, as well as high and low-speed modes. When the robot collides with an external object (subject to external force), it can quickly detect it and stop, improving safety. With their high IP67 dust and water protection level, they can handle a variety of complex industrial environments such as oil, humidity, corrosion, etc.
HSRCR.d7: Admissible Moment of Inertia: 0.12 to 0.31 kgm²
HSRCR.d9: Rated power/voltage/current: 1.1 kW / single-phase AC220 V / 5 A
HSRCR.d10: Body/electrical cabinet protection level: IP67 / IP20

BMScara.des: The Auctech BM-SCARA is a state-of-the-art robot designed to optimize and streamline industrial processes with precision and efficiency. This model stands out for its versatility and high speed, making it the ideal choice for a wide range of assembly, pick-and-place, and material handling applications.
BMScara.d7: Installation mode: Floor / Work surface installation

BMSeries.des: The Auctech BM Industrial Series offers a versatile range of robots designed to adapt to various industrial applications, from light tasks to high-load operations. With a modular and flexible design, these robots are built to integrate easily into different production environments, ensuring precision, efficiency, and reliability.

BRSeries6.des: This series offers a range of advanced solutions for industrial automation, designed to meet the demands of various sectors in the industry. Combining high precision, robustness, and versatility, this series is aimed at improving production efficiency, reducing operational costs, and ensuring quality in a wide variety of industrial applications.
BRSeries6.d8: Installation mode: Floor mounting / Structure / Ceiling

BRSeries4.des: This industrial robot is designed for applications requiring precision and high speed in simple four-axis movements. With its compact and efficient design, it is ideal for tasks such as assembly, palletizing, material handling, and pick-and-place operations. Its robust structure ensures stability and durability in demanding industrial environments. This robot stands out for its easy integration into automated production lines, offering reliable performance and excellent cost-benefit ratio to optimize production processes.
BRSeries4.d8: Installation mode: Floor mounting / Structure / Ceiling

BRWelding.des: Auctech offers high-performance industrial welding robots designed to provide advanced solutions in automating welding processes in industrial environments. These robots stand out for their combination of precision, power, and versatility, making them an ideal choice for a variety of welding applications in modern industry.
BRWelding.d9: Installation mode: Floor mounting / Structure / Ceiling

ASRACR.des: Auctech offers high-performance industrial welding robots designed to provide advanced solutions in automating welding processes in industrial environments. These robots stand out for their combination of precision, power, and versatility, making them an ideal choice for a variety of welding applications in modern industry.
ASRACR.d9: Certification: In ISO 13849-1, Cat.3 PL d, ISO 10218-1. EU CE marketing requirements
ASRACR.d10: Installation mode: Installed in any direction

XSeries.d9: Installation mode: Installed in any direction

XMobile.d1: Dimensions (Length, width, height): 1250 mm × 600 mm × 1070 mm ±0.03 mm
XMobile.d8: Driving form: Two-wheel differential, mecanum wheel
XMobile.d9: Battery: DC51.2V Lithium Iron Phosphate LFP
XMobile.d10: Safety: Collision detection / contact safety / laser obstacle avoidance / emergency stop

XExplosion.d9: Installation mode: Installed in any direction

XSeries7.d9: Installation mode: Installed in any direction

XDual.d1: Degrees of freedom: 7 x 2 (The head is optional)
XDual.d2: Payload range: 6 kg (3 kg x 2) and 10 kg (5 kg x 2)
XDual.d3: Reach: 600 mm x 2 and 800 mm x 2
XDual.d9: Installation mode: Installed in any direction

808.d3: Maximum number of axes: 4 axes (M) / 3 axes (T)
808.d4: Maximum number of spindle axes per channel: 2 axes (M and T)
808.d5: Axes controlled by PMC function: 1 axis (M and T)
808.d6: Number of channels: Max 1 axis (M) / 2 axes (T) standard 1 axis (M and T)
808.d7: Simultaneous moving axes: 3 axes (M and T)
808.d8: Maximum number of inputs and outputs: 128 inputs / 128 outputs

818.d4: Maximum number of spindle axes per channel: 4 axes
818.d5: Axes controlled by PMC function: 3 axes
818.d6: Number of channels: 2 axes standard 1 axis
818.d8: Maximum number of inputs and outputs: 2048 inputs / 2048 outputs

848.d2: Simultaneously controlled axes: 9 axes (M and T)
848.d3: Maximum number of axes: 32 axes (M and T)
848.d4: Maximum number of spindle axes per channel: 4 axes (M and T)
848.d5: Axes controlled by PMC function: 32 axes (M and T)
848.d6: Number of channels: Max 10 axes (M and T) standard 1 axis (M and T)
848.d8: Maximum number of inputs and outputs: 1096 inputs / 4096 outputs

M618i.des: M618i/M6180i admite los protocolos MIII y EtherCAT, además del bus y el eje principal, también tiene control de doble spindle DA y de pulso, lo que hace que la configuración sea más flexible. La interfaz de depuración integrada facilita a los usuarios maximizar el rendimiento de la máquina herramienta y realizar roscados rígidos y de alta velocidad
M618i.d13: Hardware de servocontrol de bucle de corriente
M618i.d14: Conversión de pendientes de alta velocidad y precisión GSG
M618i.d15: Algoritmo de interpolación a escala nanométrica NIA
M618i.d18: Panel estándar: GS3022W001, GH4012W001 y GH4025L001

M620i.des: Auctech M620i/M6200i está equipada profesionalmente con una máquina herramienta CNC de interpolación de 5 ejes, con función de doble canal y algoritmo de interpolación a escala nanométrica (NIV) como estándar. La innovadora función RTCP (punto central de herramienta rotada) cambia de manera flexible entre estructuras como cabezales oscilantes y cunas, rompiendo las restricciones a las importaciones. M620i/M6200i tiene funciones de lectura previa de hasta 5000 segmentos de programas y ajuste de múltiples segmentos de línea, garantía de alto brillo y procesamiento de piezas de trabajo compuestas.
M620i.d13: Hardware de servocontrol de bucle de corriente
M620i.d14: Control punto central de herramienta girada RTCP
M620i.d15: Conversión de pendientes de alta velocidad y precisión GSG
M620i.d16: Algoritmo de interpolación a escala nanométrica NIA
M620i.d18: Panel estándar: BS3012W001, GS3030L001, GT4022L001, GH4025L001 y BS4014W001

M620E.des: Auctech M620E tiene variedad de posiciones clave de extensión reservadas para la personalización de diferentes interfaces de trabajo. Soporta MIII e interfaz de pulso EtherCAT e interfaz de cantidad analógica.
M620E.d1: Basado en un bajo consumo de energía y alto rendimiento ARM A9 y marco x86
M620E.d2: La posición reservada de la llave de extensión es conveniente para Personalización de diferentes interfaces de trabajo.
M620E.d5: Interfaz RJ45 “para todo”, servo, E/S, externa unidad auxiliar, configuración de bus unificada, simplificada diseño y cableado.
M620E.d6: Función de código G CNC incorporada.
M620E.d7: Ajuste servo incorporado/ajuste circular/roscado de alta velocidad y otras optimizaciones en línea y funciones de ajuste.
M620E.d9: Interfaz CNC abierta, M3/EtherCAT/pulso/simulación, adaptarse a varios servosistemas nacionales y extranjeros.
M620E.d10: Edición en línea de PLC, más conveniente para la función mejora y sugerencias.
M620E.d11: GSG de conversión de pendientes de alta velocidad y alta precisión.
M620E.d12: La función de cuatro canales admite aplicaciones en complejos situaciones.
M620E.d13: Algoritmo de Interpolación a escala nanométrica (NIA).
M620E.d14: Definición rápida de código M sin cambiar el PLC

M621S.des: Auctech M621S admite hasta 3200 puntos de función de E/S externa, es compatible con MIII, la interfaz de pulso EtherCAT y la interfaz de cantidad analógica. M621s tiene Función de cuatro canales, admite control de movimiento de hasta 50 ejes. Tiene función multi-PLC para que puedan cambier entre diferentes estados de trabajo.
M621S.d1: Edición en línea de PLC, más conveniente para mejora de funciones y avisos.
M621S.d2: EtherCAT/interfaz digital de pulso/analógica interfaz de cantidad.
M621S.d3: Placa de E/S de Bus ampliada a 50 unidades, soporte hasta 3200 puntos de E/S.
M621S.d6: El control de movimiento de 50 ejes satisface la función automática.
M621S.d7: Requisito de múltiples estaciones y múltiples movimientos.
M621S.d8: Marco x86/pantalla completamente táctil/flexible teclado virtual.
M621S.d9: Interfaz RJ45 “para todo”, servo, E/S, unidad auxiliar externa, bus unificado configuración, diseño y cableado simplificados.
M621S.d10: La posición reservada de la llave de extensión es conveniente para la personalización de diferentes trabajos interfaz.
M621S.d11: Funciones de PLC múltiple para que los clientes cambien entre estados de trabajo.
M621S.d12: Definición rápida del código M sin cambiar SOCIEDAD ANÓNIMA.
M621S.d13: Función de código G CNC estándar incorporada.

M635i.des: Auctect M635i es un sistema de integración inteligente para taller digital, tiene configuración de hardware de alta gama y avanzada configuración de software. M635i admite la corriente principal nacional y extranjera protocolos de comunicación y comparte información de trabajo con otros sistemas en la nube. Realiza el control remoto en la nube, fábrica no tripulada, despacho remoto de producción y mantenimiento de máquinas.
M635i.d1: MES Internet conectado a la gestión en la nube.
M635i.d5: Interfaz RJ45 'para todo', servo, E/S, unidad auxiliar externa,poder configurar 1.000 unidades de estación esclava.
M635i.d6: Admite TI convencional nacional y extranjera intercambio de datos, colaboración eficiente producción y asignación de recursos.
M635i.d7: CNC estándar EtherCAT / pulse interfaz/interfaz analógica.
M635i.d8: Sistema de fabricación flexible e inteligente. Control de nubes.
M635i.d9: Fábrica no tripulada, monitoreo remoto y despacho del progreso de la producción, remoto mantenimiento y depuración de máquina herramienta.

CentrodeMecanizado.des: Our CNC machining centers deliver excellent performance, combining stability, precision, processing efficiency, advanced CNC control technology, and refined manufacturing processes. Based on high-quality products and a strong technical support team, we are committed to providing all customers with the best and most cost-effective CNC machining solutions. Our CNC machining centers are widely used in metal processing and manufacturing in the automotive, mechanical engineering, medical, and other fields.

TornoCNC.des: Auctech M620i/M6200i is professionally equipped with a CNC machine tool for 5-axis interpolation, featuring dual-channel functionality and a nanometric scale interpolation algorithm (NIV) as standard. The innovative RTCP (Rotated Tool Center Point) function flexibly switches between structures such as oscillating heads and cradles, breaking import restrictions. M620i/M6200i offers pre-reading functions of up to 5000 program segments and multi-line segment adjustment, ensuring high brightness and processing of composite workpieces.
TornoCNC.d1: Types: Horizontal Bed, Vertical Bed, Inclined Bed

Encoders.des: Our encoders are designed to provide precise and reliable solutions for measuring position, speed, and direction in industrial and automated applications. With robust construction and advanced technology, these devices are ideal for demanding environments where precision and durability are essential.
Encoders.d2: Various shaft types: Solid, Hollow, Tapered, Semi-hollow, Linear
Encoders.d4: Output signal type: Open collector, Voltage, Push-pull, Line driver (Differential)
Encoders.d5: With resolution from 10 ppr to 5000 ppr
Encoders.d7: Power supply: 5V DC, 5V DC - 26V DC, 12V DC

Proximidad.des: Our proximity sensors are advanced devices designed to detect the presence or absence of objects without physical contact. Using cutting-edge technology, these sensors offer a reliable and durable solution for industrial and automation applications, where precise detection is essential to ensure process efficiency and safety.
Proximidad.d1: Type: Inductive, Hall effect, Capacitive, Analog, Ring
Proximidad.d2: In cylindrical, flat, or rectangular shapes
Proximidad.d5: Output configuration: NPN, PNP, DC 2-wire, AC 2-wire
Proximidad.d6: Operation mode: NO, NC, NO + NC
Proximidad.d7: With protection grades: IEC IP67, IEC IP66

Fotoelectricos.des: Photoelectric sensors are high-precision devices designed to detect the presence, absence, or changes in the position of objects through the interruption of a light beam and reflective accessories. Our photoelectric sensors offer a reliable and versatile solution for various industrial applications, where precise detection is key to ensuring the efficiency and safety of automated processes.
Fotoelectricos.d1: Type: Diffuse reflection, Retro-reflective, Through-beam, Fiber Optic
Fotoelectricos.d5: Output signal type: NPN, PNP, AC 2-wire, Relay
Fotoelectricos.d6: Operation mode: NO, NC, NO + NC

Area.des: Our area sensors are ideal for safety and automation applications. These sensors offer precise and reliable coverage, making them a key solution for improving safety and operational efficiency in industrial and commercial environments.
Area.d8: Output signal type: NPN, PNP, relay

HNC VFDs and Servo For Aseptic Filling M.des: The medium is heated following filling (in a purified bottle) together with the bottle in the so-called pasteurizer
HNC VFDs and Servo For Aseptic Filling M.d1: The medium is heated shortly before the filler
HNC VFDs and Servo For Aseptic Filling M.d2: Typical products include tea, 100% juices, drinks with a pH value higher than 4.5 (i.e. bacterially sensitive products). This is often followed by aseptic filling
HNC VFDs and Servo For Aseptic Filling M.d3: Filling is carried out in a clean room. Previously the complete filler was in a clean room, nowadays only the actual filling process is located in a clean room
HNC VFDs and Servo For Aseptic Filling M.d4: 2~5 servo axis per machine or 1 big motor drive with gearbox
HNC VFDs and Servo For Aseptic Filling M.d7: HV100 / HV480 / HV610 / HSD2 / SV-E3 / HSD7
HNC VFDs and Servo For Aseptic Filling M.d8: Dynamic response for acceleration/ emergency stop
HNC VFDs and Servo For Aseptic Filling M.d9: Angular synchronous operation with external encoder
HNC VFDs and Servo For Aseptic Filling M.d10: Servo technology in high end machine(every filler has one servo motor)
